messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Space Station 13 have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: CentCom airlock control override activated. Please take this time to get acquainted with your coworkers.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
General Alert

What the fuck was that?!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Atmospherics alert

The scrubbers network is experiencing a backpressure surge. Some ejection of contents may occur.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Fluffy Alert

Unidentified furry objects detected coming aboard Space Station 13. Beware of Adorable-ness.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
THE CALL IS COMING FROM INSIDE THE HOUSE

A SKELETON POPS OUT!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: It's Valentine's Day! Give a valentine to that special someone!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Unknown Transmission

Santa is coming to town!
